description: Rotherham United appoint former defender Richard Wood as their first-team coach.
title: Richard Wood: Rotherham United appoint former defender as coach
title_page: Richard Wood: Rotherham United appoint former defender as coach - BBC Sport
maintext:
Rotherham have appointed former defender Richard Wood as their first-team coach.
The 39-year-old made 230 league appearances for the Millers between 2014 and 2023 and helped them to win promotion to the Championship three times.
